name: Fission (itch) (Cakestorm)
description:
You are a single little neutron in an old, decrepit nuclear reactor - so find some fissile material to start it up again! Jump around, stick to walls, blow yourself up - anything to get this reactor going.

With 8 levels to zap your way through, and a challenging par system to keep you thinking ahead, you'll have at least 5 minutes of fun - and isn't that better than nothing? Also, if any of you manage to beat the par scores, please do tell me! I barely managed to get most of them, so it would be great to see if anyone managed to beat those records (without cheating!)

CONTROLS

If you need a refresher on the controls, then they are:

  • Hold down the mouse to fire
  • Right mouse button to restart the level
  • Press the X in the corner (or the escape key) to exit to the main menu
